content.data: Arrival is a UK startup focused on full development cycle ofÂ zero-emission vehicles. It's one of the largest UK tech companies with $13 billion valuation.

I joined the team as a Lead Designer at the end of 2021. Since when I'm responsible for all customer support interactions. I formulate user scenarios, conduct UX researches, negotiate with core stakeholders, and support devs with implementation.
Unfortunately, the project is under NDA now, so I can't show much. But I'm eager to show more soon.
